name: The Cube (itch) (genaralskar)
description:
Hidden deep in the recesses of the earth lies a strange cube. It seems to operate on some kind of magic, but no one has been able to figure it out yet.

Controls:

Left Click to interact with objects/panels

"I" opens your inventory

Escape will back you out of closeup/inventory

When the screen fades to white that means you won!

The clear crystals are supposed to change to the combined colors when placed in the correct spot, but they currently don't. Hopefully this doesn't add too much confusion

Most of the game is "Programmer Art," so visually it's very minimal.
